resources.string:
The information in this application contains designs which give an easy on-site installation guide when fixing connectors, nail plates and structural brackets in relation to the Building Code Approved Documents B1 Structure and B2 Durability. 

 Characteristic Loadings Data for LUMBERLOCK® Timber Connectors and BOWMAC® Structural Brackets are not covered in their entirety in this application. Refer to separate brochures for design values. 

 The applications in this site guide are to be configured in accordance with the instructions. Substitution of specified or recommended components with alternative brands may compromise performance. 

 Further design advice on the selection of MiTek® products can be provided byoir technical support offices in Auckland or Christchurch.
